alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 5:01PM MST until December 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, |* Insert hazard descriptor *|. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, |* Insert hazard descriptor *| expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern High Plains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday evening and Wednesday morning commutes. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
